entry.title: Threat Modeling Browser’s Storage
entry.summary: Threat Modeling Browser’s Storage Introduction In the early days of the World Wide Web, websites were primarily static. The server responded with the same static file (say home.html for the home page) without any user-specific personalization on every request.
